name: test_e2e_with_logs[577_HPP_FILTER_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HPP_FILTER_001` |
| **Name** | HPP conflicting admin values |
| **Category** | HPP |
| **Subcategory** | filter_evasion |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&admin=true&role=admin&admin=false&role=user`
- **Encoded**: `%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Dadmin%26admin%3Dfalse%26role%3Duser`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~14000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:21:04.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected test_id=HPP_FILTER_001-1772266864285-l6f3gt pattern_id=HPP_FILTER_001 uri=/?q=%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Dadmin%26admin%3Dfalse%26role%3Duser client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected test_id=HPP_FILTER_001-1772266864285-l6f3gt pattern_id=HPP_FILTER_001 uri=/?q=%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Dadmin%26admin%3Dfalse%26role%3Duser client=127.0.0.1
